members.joinCircumstances: Demaro Black impersonated Monkey D. Luffy to exploit his reputation after the timeskip.

keyMoments.title: Fake Straw Hat Crew Exposed
keyMoments.description: Sentomaru exposes Demaro Black as an impostor with PX-5's help, revealing his true identity and low bounty of 26 million berries. The Fake Straw Hat Crew's deception is uncovered.
keyMoments.significance: Ends the impostor crew's operation and demonstrates the gap between reputation and reality.

keyMoments.title: Fake Straw Hats Battle Marines
keyMoments.description: The Fake Straw Hat Crew and allied pirates battle Marines at Grove 46 before Sentomaru's arrival.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the impostors attempting to maintain their deception through combat.

jollyRoger.description: Imitation of the Straw Hat Pirates' Jolly Roger

members.joinCircumstances: Caribou is the captain and founder of the Caribou Pirates.

keyMoments.title: Caribou Reveals Devil Fruit Powers
keyMoments.description: Caribou, captain of the Caribou Pirates, reveals his Numa Numa no Mi Logia powers while battling Marines at Grove 46.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Caribou as a dangerous pirate with Logia-type abilities.

jollyRoger.description: Unknown - not shown in this episode
